GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit cc62dde2a5f4ba14016fd9caec76f08d388f4b9c, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit eac1e731b59ee3b5f5e641a7765c7ed41ed26226. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init
